descriptionNullable:
The original dataset was obtained from **[AI-Lab Makerere](https://github.com/AI-Lab-Makerere/ibean/)**. The images were captured in bean fields by the Makerere AI lab in collaboration with the National Crops Resources Research Institute (NaCRRI), Uganda's national body in charge of agricultural research.

The dataset was already split into train, test, and validation sets. However, I merged the train, test, and validation images manually, and used the XnViewMP program to rename the files.

There are three classes in the dataset:
* Angular Leaf Spot,
* Bean rust, and
* Healthy
title: bean disease dataset
subtitle: For Image Classification
description:
The original dataset was obtained from **[AI-Lab Makerere](https://github.com/AI-Lab-Makerere/ibean/)**. The images were captured in bean fields by the Makerere AI lab in collaboration with the National Crops Resources Research Institute (NaCRRI), Uganda's national body in charge of agricultural research.

The dataset was already split into train, test, and validation sets. However, I merged the train, test, and validation images manually, and used the XnViewMP program to rename the files.

There are three classes in the dataset:
* Angular Leaf Spot,
* Bean rust, and
* Healthy
